About Me

BIO

I a second year student at Vellore Institute of Technology who is an out of the box thinker with great skills. With an avid interest in coding since the age of 10 years, I have now mastered various languages. I constantly challenge himself to develop new ideas and apps. Being an all-rounder, I have many hobbies like swimming,table tennis,playing the keyboard,treakking. My strong communication skills and sportsmanship have allowed me to take on new endeavors and succeed. I am a man with a plan and always focus on the outcomes rather than the problem.
